hotels.title: Elegant Kanazawa Stay Near Celebrated Cherry Blossom Gardens
hotels.description: Escape to the glamorous ANA Crowne Plaza Kanazawa, an IHG Hotel, and discover the natural beauty of the Ishikawa Prefecture, on Japan’s central Honshu Island. This hotel is the perfect base for visits to the famed Kenrokuen, one of Japan's most beautiful landscape gardens, and the magical Kanazawa Castle Park. Immerse yourself in the region's culture and cuisine from your central escape with modern restaurants, a fitness centre and more.
